attributes.action: Claim back the cost of all expenses issued to MP's that will not meet the criteria of any subsequent reform of MPs 2nd home allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British public expect their members of parliament to act honourably, honestly and with high standing of morals in the way they conduct business.  It is unacceptable that they have claimed expenses for items that are not true to the spirit of the second home allowance.   

To claim their actions were within the rules is totally unacceptable!  The actions of these MP’s have tainted all members of the House of Commons as:

Thieves, crooks, benefit cheats, scumbags, liars, dirty, dishonest, fraudsters, etc

Furthermore the trust, respect and integrity of the House of Commons have been washed in the mud.

The British people expect the allowances will be changed so the MP’s will not cheat the system again.  Taxpayer also expects their money back from those that have ripped of the British public to benefit themselves!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
